instruction: Give advice on how to dress for a job interview.
output: When attending a job interview, it is important to wear clothing that is professional and appropriate for the position. Show that you are serious and dignified by wearing a dress shirt or suit, tailored trousers, and dress shoes. Make sure your clothes are clean, pressed and without any wrinkles or stains. Avoid wearing too much jewellery, and if possible, avoid wearing any fragrance or cologne.
